recipe.title: Potato Gratin
recipe.subtitle: Serves 4-6 This is a rich and luscious treatment of with garlic, a few knobs of butter, and covered with 150 ml milk and cooked the same way. Add a grinding of black pepper and the cheese if desired.
recipe.ingredients: 900 9 potatoes, peeled and sliced salt and pepper 1-2 garlic cloves, skinned and crushed pinch of nutmeg, freshly grated 150 ml cream 75 g gruyere cheese, grated
recipe.steps: Cook the potatoes in boiling salted water for five minutes, then drain well. Turn into a greased oven-proof dish. Stir the seasoning, garlic and nutmeg into the cream and pour over the potatoes. Sprinkle with cheese, cover and cook at 180Â°C for 45 minutes until potatoes are tender. Uncover the dish and brown under a hot grill.
